titleStmt.title: The contented pilgrim: or, The pilgrims troublesome journey to his long home. He waits with patience and is well content, and desires all Christian people to repent, for the blessed soul that intends to Heaven to go, must work with patience whether he will or no. Tune is, Let patience work for me. This may be printed, R.L.S.
